Nodelets are small boxes which display information or provide an interface to some function of the site. There are many nodelets to choose from. Some are available only to certain [id://238736|orders of monks]. You can add and remove nodelets to/from your default page display, and control the order in which they are presented; do this on your [id://25185] page. See [id://786922] for details.

Now go check out The Available [id://483095].

(Note: The nodelets available only to [gods] are not documented here.)
